extendedInfo.description: Go Cardless with CardStarâ¢ from Constant Contact. Fast, easy & secure! LIGHTEN YOUR WALLET and move your plastic loyalty cards, reward cards and membership cards to your phone so you never miss out on a reward, discount, or deal again. IMPORT YOUR CARDS IN MINUTES using your phoneâs camera for hundreds of national and regional retailers, libraries and associations. If we donât support a card, or if your card doesnât have a barcode, itâs easy to create a custom card.BROWSE THOUSANDS OF DEALS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS including special offers, sales, daily deals and much more from your favorite places to shop. Save grocery coupons directly to your card â no clipping required. Get deals when and where you want them. CHECK OUT IN STYLE and have the cashier scan your cards directly from your phone. Note: this feature is designed to work with many models of handheld scanning guns, but not self-checkout stations or belt scanners. In the event that a barcode does not scan, have the cashier can enter your number by hand.YOUR INFORMATION STAYS PRIVATE AND SECURE with advanced features like card backup and passcode lock. Protect your cards from loss or unauthorized use.

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Although I haven\'t had the opportunity to use it in any stores, I will say that I am impressed with the ease of setup and the overall look and feel.
reviews.author: Eric Fields

reviews.title: Works well enough
reviews.comment: The only problem is getting the right barcode type sometimes if you can\'t scan. Beyond that, the app is great!
reviews.author: Anthony Jenkins

reviews.title: Only used to Card star a couple of times.  Convenient!
reviews.comment: Useful and easy to use, generally.  Did have difficulty with certain barcodes however.
reviews.author: Duane Miyagishima

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Not all stores will scan the phone and Sams club still wants to see your picture..... Other than that this app is FANTASTIC!

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Love this app! It does exactly what it says it will do. And it\'s very user friendly.  Thanks for a great app!
reviews.author: Cindy Muller

reviews.title: Super helpful!
reviews.comment: Loyalty cards finally in the 21st century.  Almost found every card i had.  Very easy to register a card too.
reviews.author: Bing Wang

reviews.title: Tku CardStar cindy5322
reviews.comment: Awesome and Efficient. Made my life easier. No more loose cards to flip through in stores. You\'ll love the convenience of always having all of your loyalty cards at hand with just a tap on your Smartphone\'s screen. ;) ;)
reviews.author: Cindy Wantland

reviews.title: It scans great
reviews.comment: It works good at the cashier.  A good hint. Take off the fancy screan protector.  It messes up there scanners. But it works good for me.
reviews.author: LONNIE RAMSEY

reviews.title: Easy to enter cards
reviews.comment: It was very easy to enter the card numbers.  I found a couple of times the card numbers came in wrong and I had to rescan.  I also would suggest making it a little more intuitive to enter a name for a vendor that is not in the database.  The top line says \"Other\" and you have to edit the Title field down in the middle of the screen.  Looking forward to seeing which merchants can accept phone-based numbers!
reviews.author: Craig Gemmill

reviews.title: after upgrade, doesn\'t display barcodes OOB
reviews.comment: after a factory reset of my device, pulling down the latest version of the app, and restoring from the cloud sync - it appears that none of my cards are set to display barcodes anymore.
reviews.author: Ted Phillips

reviews.title: Massive Battery Hog
reviews.comment: This app is draining my battery in a few hours.  It auto turns on and is doing something with GPS?  Why do you need to know where I am to store the bar codes from my key chain?    Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jake Cross

reviews.title: It comsumes battery sooooo much
reviews.comment: I dont know why it should run in background. When i kill it, it revives. Its like zombie.
reviews.author: BJ J

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Although you may have some trouble scanning the bar code, there is the option of putting it in manually and I\'ve had no trouble using it at stores.  I never realized how many I had.  Sure saves time carrying all in one place without rummaging for it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easily scan store and library cards into your phone.
reviews.comment: Love not having all of those keychain cards. Easy to use app.
reviews.author: Laura Solomon

reviews.title: So far, good!
reviews.comment: I have just installed the app and used it a couple of times but it seems to work fine!
reviews.author: Larry Workman

reviews.title: Easy & convenient, usually
reviews.comment: I do like that I don\'t have to dig through my wallet at a check out to find a loyalty card. Unfortunately some stores tell me that their scanners don\'t register the barcodes on the phone and the cashier had to type in the code manually. Other than that it\'s a very useful program.
reviews.author: Kirvin Driscoll

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Really great App. Saves me having to carry all the bonus cards. Onky drawback is some stores don\'t want to scan off the smart phone. The stores need to get into the 21st century!
reviews.author: Ann Lefevre

reviews.title: This app is a life saver! Love it!!
reviews.comment: Five stars to the space I saved in my purse ;)
reviews.author: Andrene Castillo

reviews.title: Telling EVERYONE!
reviews.comment: Fantastic app no one should be without! Referred friends & strangers alike...easy to set up & use, and no more stack of loyalty cards weighing down my purse. Thanks Card Star!

reviews.title: Extremely Handy App
reviews.comment: I am always the consumer in line at checkouts with out my mvp store/department reward card! Now that I\'ve discovered CardStar I always have all of my cards in hand on my android! :) Very easy to download and use...
reviews.author: Leia Loveday
